faust.joins¶

Join strategies.

class faust.joins.Join(*, stream: faust.types.streams.JoinableT, fields: Tuple[faust.types.models.FieldDescriptorT, ...]) → None[source]¶

Base class for join strategies.

async process(event: faust.types.events.EventT) → Optional[faust.types.events.EventT][source]¶

Process event to be joined with another event.

Return type

Optional[EventT[~T]]
